}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''HP''' SPS # 676786-001, AS # 676690-001, ''Code Name: Miami''
This module is used within the '''HP''' Chromebook 14 (Falco). It's visible here on [http://imgur.com/a/aGSQC#tbFJv2m this chap's imgur teardown].
It would appear the USB ID for the BT portion is '''0cf3:311e'''. [https://deviwiki.com/w/index.php?title=User_talk:M86&diff=prev&oldid=120375]
==Links of Interest== ===Additional external links=== *[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2198267 Subsystem noted on this '''Ubuntu Forums''' post as 103c:1864], also shows the BT USB ID as 0cf3:311e
[[Category:English Documentation]]
